title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 26.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 26.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this Part: (a) Council means a Regents chartered
broadcasting corporation designated by the department's State plan to provide a
major broadcast station and production studio facilities in the municipalities
of Buffalo, Garden City, Rochester, Schenectady, Syracuse and New York City and
any other municipality the commissioner may designate. (b) Association means a Regents chartered
broadcasting corporation designated by the department's State plan to provide a
broadcast station with limited studio production capability as approved by the
commissioner. (c) State plan means
the plan of broadcast station development as approved by the commissioner in
accordance with rules and regulations of the Federal Communications

Commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
26.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
